title: The Adult They'll Become
itunes:author: Guest: Rhonda Stoppe
itunes:summary:
When your child is young, you dream about the man or woman they'll become. But how do you prepare them for the future ahead? John and Danny share how you can invest in your child's future by teaching them God's Word. Featuring Rhonda Stoppe.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Rhonda Stoppe's book "Moms Raising Sons to be Men" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-11-16?refcd=1299906

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/the-adult-theyll-become/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
